doc:
Justin Eugene Evans https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justin_Eugene_Evans 0 Justin Eugene Evans (born March 1, 1973) is an American film director, cinematographer, screenwriter, producer, visual effects supervisor, inventor, Autism advocate and college instructor. His feature film, A Lonely Place for Dying, was accepted into 43 film festivals, nominated for 56 awards and won 29 including 18 as Best Picture. He is the founder and president of BryteWerks, a consumer electronics company. He is also a college instructor at The Art Institutes of Wisconsin. Justin_Eugene_Evans ( born March_1_,_1973 ) is an_American_film_director , cinematographer , screenwriter , producer , visual_effects_supervisor , inventor , Autism_advocate_and_college_instructor . His_feature_film , A_Lonely_Place for Dying , was_accepted into 43_film_festivals , nominated for 56_awards and won 29_including_18_as_Best_Picture . He is the_founder_and_president of BryteWerks , a_consumer_electronics_company . He is also a_college_instructor at The_Art_Institutes of Wisconsin .
